sections.general: account representative professional summary i am a social media and public relations professional, experienced in creating direct-to-consumer and internal communications for global brands. i am also the founder of @wandering_for_eats, a foodie instagram brand with over 3.5k followers and multiple partnerships with local businesses in hudson county, new jersey.
